official_title: A bill to redesignate the Federal Building and United States Courthouse in Amarillo, Texas, the "Marvin Jones Federal Building".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building and United States courthouse in Amarillo, Texas, as the "Marvin Jones Federal Building."

titles.title: A bill to redesignate the Federal Building and United States Courthouse in Amarillo, Texas, the "Marvin Jones Federal Building".
